channel.title: Personal on tek256
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on tek256

item.title: quest across the US
item.description: Hey, The last few years I’ve been sort of entranced with the idea of road tripping across the US from one coast to the next. It’s even on my bucket list. Another part of this trip is that I’ve been working on film & keeping up with making a documentary across throughout the whole process of making my game Lost Souls. I’ll be doing my best to document what I can with what I have.

item.title: my bucket list
item.description: One day I’m going to die. This is a universal truth for each and every one of us. The last few weeks before writing this have been rough for me. That’s why I’m writing this, as a message to my future self to recognize where I was and where I’ve gotten to. I encourage everyone to write a bucket list of their own. Here are the current goals of mine, I won’t remove any, but I will add some if I start to run low.
